body.name: Nuwave Brio 15.5Qt Air Fryer Rotisserie Oven, X-Large Family Size, Powerful 1800W, 4 Rack Positions, 50°-425°F Temp Controls, 100 Presets & 50 Memory, Integrated Smart Thermometer, Linear T Technology
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 14 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 14 mins
features: MAKE ADJUSTMENTS ON-THE-FLY – Want hotter temperature or need to cook it longer? Simply adjust on-the-fly any time. Control time and temperature any time in the cooking process. Brio’s intuitive digital controls are easy to operate.

DIGITAL CONTROLS - Set cook temperatures from 50°F to 425°F adjustable in precise 5°F increments. Unlike the primitive methods that regulate temperature by turning the heater on and off, our heater never turns off while cooking.
POWERFUL CONVECTION FAN – Brio is an air fryer oven with a powerful 5-inch convection fan. It’s top mounted and promotes unrivaled cyclonic convection circulation.

MULTI-LAYER COOKING - With 4 rack positions and multi-purpose racks, multi-layer cooking is more convenient than ever before. Cooking delicious meals for the entire family is now easy. It’s the perfect combination of capacity and versatility.

DELICIOUS ROTISSERIE – Self-basting rotation browns the whole chicken sealing in the flavors while unwanted fats drip away. You can also tumble fry vegetables or French fries to perfection. Get inspired & create your own masterpieces.

HEALTHY FRIED FOOD - Brio uses super-heated air and an efficient air-flow design to cook crispy, delicious fried foods without guilt. No more messy oils, added fats, or calories. Air fry all your favorites - even from frozen, without defrosting.

INTEGRATED DIGITAL SMART THERMOMETER - Once the desired doneness temperature is set, Brio constantly monitors the internal temperature of your food and automatically ends the cooking process when the desired internal temperature is reached.

100 PRE-PROGRAMMED MENU PRESETS – Brio is programmed with 100 pre-programmed menu presets allowing you to cook all your favorites - even from frozen, without defrosting. It is the perfect combination of convenience and versatility.

CARRYOVER COOKING - It also features carryover cooking mode. Brio compensates for the carryover cooking that will inevitably occur after cooking. When engaged, this feature ensures that the food is not overcooked while resting.

WHAT’S INCLUDED – Brio comes with SS Mesh Rack & SS Mesh Tray, Non-Stick Drip Tray, SS Rotisserie Basket & SS Skewer Kit, and Reversible Non-Stick Grill Griddle Plate, Digital Smart Thermometer, Quick & Easy Cooking Guide, and Owner’s Manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much faster than previous air fryer
reviews.reviewText: We've only had this Brio for a few weeks, but I'm loving it so far. It cooks much faster than our previous air fryer (different brand). The presets are GREAT - I like having a few of those memorized so I can just punch the buttons a couple of times without having to give it much thought, and then can adjust time or temp as needed. I loving having the light, too. I also like being able to see the food as it cooks, which I couldn't do with our previous air fryer.We bought the round drum rotisserie basket later, but I'm not sure we'll use it very often. So far, I've used it 3 or 4 times, thinking it would get easier with familiarity, but I think the trays will do the same thing without the hassle, so I'm not sure that extra was worth the expense. But the Brio oven itself - yes, definitely worth it.Used the flat rotisserie basket (included with the oven) to cook some Italian sausage links, and LOVED it. It's easier to use than the drum, so we'll use it regularly.All the trays and baskets go in the dishwasher, which makes for quick and easy clean up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NUWAVE, GRILL IS PRETTY GOOD SO FAR
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty good little grilling cookerIt's easy to use and clean, and with a bunch of time and temperature settings you can easily air grill all kinds of meat and other foods, not like any stove or grillIt doesn't heat up the house or smoke up the place like a regular oven would and with the timer you just set it and it turns it's self off, so that's makes cooking easyWith that DCVIRUS in 19 our bodies do better with more protein foods is my thoughts so I got it to help lose weight by eating more good protein grilled meatsThe draw backs of the black unit is that it's too tall to fit under a counter and needs 3 inches of room around it so, I took the electric burners out of 2 spots on the stove and put it there, but you might need a separate table or other to put it on, or think about getting the other silver nuwave model that looks like it would fit on a counter but under the cabinets.6 muffin pan fits good and are easy to make and cook so yummy muffins and biscuitsIt cooks didn't than a stove so for recipes that call for 400 degrees you probably need to turn it down to 360 degrees and for less time.I am pretty happy with it so far as I had the first round nuwave cooker for years, but didn't like cleaning it and this unit seams to do a much better job and a lot easier to use, and clean so I am using it every day.I put 3 to 5 eggs on a glass plate and put it in on 300 degrees for 10 minutes or so with some cheese on top and it turns out pretty good and I don't have to stand at the stove as it turns it's self off afterwardsHopefully it will hold up well like there earlier models that I have had for many years.When grilling meats I spray the meats with coconut oil spray first because I think it helps shear the food and the flavor stays in the meats better is my thoughtsI had it now for about a month and used it several times a day and it's fun and easy to use, and I bought it for better healthy foods, and post virus cooking needs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good product...will only hold a small whole chicken....had 2 chickens....5.1lbs and 6.7lbs. The 6.7lbs did not fit. Also design of the air fryer DOES NOT fit under standard cabinets on countertop so for me to use I have to use it on my dining room table because it is 1/4 inch too high to fit on my counter top. I guess I could place on top of my stovetop but it defeats the purpose of being a household item. Another issue....the heat comes from the top so cooking pizza will not work unless you want hard crispy topping and burnt cheese. I have an older version of NUWAVE to where I can set the top heat lower so my toppings don't burn....this NUWAVE is a major step back for size and cooking ability but does have the rotisserie which works well for tiny chicken or hens or fish. Something that I have always wanted. I have 28 more days and I am leaning toward returning it as it will not fit under my cabinets under my cabinets which is a major disappointment. What a shame. I guess the design team didn't think about it fitting on the countertop. To use it you will need an kitchen island or your dining room table as it will not fit on countertops because it is too tall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my Newave
reviews.reviewText: At first, I was so frustrated about the use of the oven, that I almost returned it. I don't use the program function, it is too confusing. Just turning it on, adjusting the time and temp is all I need. The probe is amazing and enables me to cook everything to perfection. Food comes out with a crunchy, golden brown with flaky soft insides. French fries are incredible. I cook my tri-tip in my Brio and it comes out with a perfect "crust" and juicy insides. It's so easy to clean, the door even comes off so it can be washed under water. When I washed the exterior, the letters came off. I contacted the company and they immediately sent me a template to place over the other control panel and that fixed it. I love, love, love my Brio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this air fryer. Really high performance and cooks meals quickly. Good size oven and worth every penny. I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Meals Out of this
reviews.reviewText: This oven is off the hook! We have put at least 20 meals through this already. Shuck roast, fries, veggies, garlic break, jalapeno poppers, and more. This is a great kitchen gadget.
